scripts.say: Our brave little bird seems to be heading to the Sculpture Room. How annoying...
How many times must they meddle in things that aren't their concern? Why do they not realize the magnificence of the Creator's plans?
My sister, please, control yourself. As long as the Original does not awaken, all will be well. Sculpting it should not take long.
Then let's send out a rabbit to stall the little bird. She's been waiting for her tea party long enough...
